description:
TPO SL2 -Clearance of trees and shrubs on gas pipelines. 

These works are essential for the ongoing maintenance and safety of the gas pipeline. As part of Cadent Gas health and safety responsibility they need to maintain and inspect the pipeline regularly to ensure they are managed in accordance within the correct Pipeline Regulations.

Fell a 4m wide easement clearance through 300 linear metres of mixed species tree and scrub along the side of the main road All trees will be felled to 50mm from ground level and stacked away from the pipe line. All stumps will be treated with eco plugs to prevent regrowth. 


Following the completion of the works Cadent Gas are to replace and replant the trees which were removed from the pipeline and easement width
decision_conditions: Replant with mixed native species on completion of works
